forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In this enchanting tapestry of late summer, Downtown San Francisco basks in a canvas of crystal-clear skies and gentle breezes, painting a serene midday portrait. The sun generously casts its warm rays, urging the temperature to hover around a pleasant 72 degrees, effortlessly transitioning to a cooler embrace as afternoon dips toward 70. A refreshing west-southwest wind flows through the streets, its whispers carrying an invigorating edge, while the gusts tease the branches into joyful dances.

Even as twilight approaches, the allure of the evening beckons. Tonight’s low of around 58 promises a mild and comfortable reprieve, creating an inviting atmosphere for excursions under the clear, star-studded sky. With such delightful weather, one might choose to stroll along the Embarcadero, letting the city’s iconic landmarks unfold with each step. A festival of flavors awaits at local eateries, where outdoor seating offers a perfect spot to catch the fresh evening air. As you prepare your attire, lightweight layers will serve you well; consider a breezy shirt or top paired with a light jacket, ensuring comfort while embracing the vibrant spirit of the evening.
